welcome:

All trades you make are at you own risk!

q.5: Where can I trade using your signals?
q.8: How to understand bot messages and what to do?
q.9: What does stop order mean and how to use it?
q.11: What are the advantages of robot?
q.12: When automated robots will be available?

a.1:
Signal is a recommendation to buy or sell currency at determined price.
We will give you the signal when it is better to open and close position and what position to take. You just need to follow the recommendation of robots.
a.2:
You can use signals in 2 different ways:
Choose the robots you want and follow the recommendations.
Use the signals as additional filter to you own trading system.
a.3: All signals based on algorithms that tested on history and work in real-time more than 2 years. You can study the results of each robot.
a.4: The signals go out once a day at about the same time so itâ€™s easy to follow manually. Just repeat the orders (buy, sell or stop/limit orders). Itâ€™s important to place an order in advance, because you can skip the necessary moment.
a.5: Our signals are based on Bitfinex prices, but you can use signals at any exchange you want. Notice the possible difference in prices on different exchanges. You can find the list of exchanges here: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/
a.6:
The robots with â€œ8hâ€ in name have maximum 3 signals a day (every 8 hours).
The robots with â€œ1dâ€ in name have maximum 1 signal per day.
a.7:
Long is when we buy cryptocurrency and hope that itâ€™s price will rise. So we will sell it at higher price and get a profit.
Short is when we sell cryptocurrency (and we didnâ€™t buy it before) and hope that itâ€™s price will fall. So we buy it back at lower price and realize a profit.
a.8:
There are 2 type of messages: 'ğŸ’¸ New Trade!' and 'ğŸš¨ New Signal!'.

 ğŸ’¸ New Trade means the buy/sell market trade.
Examples:
If you see in 'ğŸ’¸ New Trade' only entry (Entry: 'SELL â¬‡ï¸ (Short ğŸ”´)' or Entry: 'BUY â¬†ï¸ (Long âœ³ï¸)' - it means that robot opened new position. For copy this action you just need to buy or sell at the same price.
If you also see in 'ğŸ’¸ New Trade' exit (Exit: 'SELL â¬‡ï¸ (Close Long âœ³ï¸)' or Exit: 'BUY â¬†ï¸ (Close Short ğŸ”´)' - it means that robot closed the position. You should do the same.

'ğŸš¨ New Signal' means the price at which you should make the trade in the future.
The signals can be both for opening and closing the position. You can just place the stop order at this price and wait for it execution or new next signal. When next signal is appeared and previous order is not executed - cancel previous order and create a new one.
a.9:
A stop order is used to trigger a market sell when the market drops to your trigger (stop) price, or used to trigger a market buy if the market rises to your trigger (stop) price.

It's better to read the FAQ on your exchange about order types and how to use them.

Example for Bitfinex:
We have the signal:
Action: BUY â¬†ï¸ (Long âœ³ï¸)
Order type: Stop â›”
Signal time: 2019-10-16 08:00 UTC
Price: 3.0687

What should you do:
1. Open Bitfinex terminal.
2. Choose the required cryptocurrency in Tickers window.
3. Then under the Tickers window you have Order form.
4. Choose margin, then stop order.
5. In the field stop price place the price from the signal (3.0687). In the field amount choose the amount of cryptocurrency you want to trade.
6. Click Margin Buy cause we have in signal â€œAction: BUYâ€.
In the middle you will have the window Orders where you will see this order. You can cancel or modify this orders with the buttons on the right.

On Kraken you should go to New order window, then choose advanced. The fields are the same. But on Kraken you need to choose the leverage for margin trading.
Every exchange has a bit different interface for creating orders and trading so you should learn the user manual of your exchange.
a.10: Robot is a program that analyzes the current situation on the market without human participation according to a laid algoritm.
a.11:
Reacts to events much faster.
Doesnâ€™t get tired and works 24 hours and 7 days a week.
Not experiencing emotions and strictly following the algorithm.
Can make a large number of transactions with different instruments.
Can wait weeks and make a deal at exactly the right moment.
Trading is conducted on tested conditions with a predictable result.
a.12: Automated robots will be available later this year. We will notify you through this bot or in Telegram Community Chat, Telegram Channel and Instagram account
